pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Red Book of Endemic Plants of Peru // Gives help to access the information from "The Red Book of Endemic Plants of Peru". The package contains a database with cleaned and standardized botanical data including occurrence and taxonomic data. The original source could be found in "Len, Blanca, Nigel Pitman, y Jos Roque. (2006). Introduccin a Las Plantas Endmicas Del Per"d oi:10.15381/rpb.v13i2.1782https://revistasinvestigacion.unmsm.e du.pe/index.php/rpb/issue/view/153.
